snippet: By incorporating voter sign-up into campus musts like orientation and class registration, universities have taken over work previously handled by outside groups.
abstract: Dozens of colleges have begun their own voting registration drives in orientation programs, class registration, Web sites and other interactions crucial to campus life, taking over work previously handled by outside groups; thousands of students have registered to vote or requested absentee ballots from their home states after arriving on campus.
lead_paragraph: By incorporating voter sign-up into campus musts like orientation and class registration, universities have taken over work previously handled by outside groups.

headline.seo: More Colleges Take a Leap Into Voter Registration
headline.main: Colleges Take a Leap Into Voter Registration
headline.print_headline: Colleges Take a Leap Into Voter Registration
